relproducts.title: Grey Goose & Anthracite Faux Wood Blind - 50mm Slat
relproducts.description: A smartly crisp grey that's light and bright, with tapes of dark slate that contrast beautifully, make for a stunning combo. The advanced polymer this wood effect blind is made from is one of its best points, crafting the look of authentic wood with none of the weaknesses - tota a smartly crisp grey that's light and bright, with tapes of dark slate that contrast beautifully, make for a stunning combo.

relproducts.title: Zambezi Anthracite Grey Real Wood
relproducts.description: Their premium zambezi painted anthracite grey real wood blind features a dark grey painted finish, great for adding polished simplicity into a room. From soft creamy neutrals to trending greys and stone shades, this real wood range adds a modern sleek finish to your windows. A shade that never goes out of trend, this grey wooden blind would adds a modern feel at a great price. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously.

relproducts.description: Simple styling with a unique twist, the galaxy anthracite roman blind will enhance a modern living space, bedroom or study. relproducts.title: Amor Ocean Green Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

relproducts.title: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the amor salmon pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. You will love it so much that from the day you put it up in your nursery it will be a slow and steady descent into pink madness until, one day, you wake up naked in a candy floss machine wondering how you let it get so bad. But that's ok. Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from.

relproducts.title: Amor Soft Peach Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of blackout fabrics are perfect for blocking the light entering your room. Use these to give your room privacy whenever you need it. Especially when you order the amor soft peach, a perfectly peachy colour to cover your window. Being blackout, no light will be able to pass through the fabric making it perfect for living rooms and bedrooms.
